title: 22 Acre Mixed Plantation with views of Koggala lake
details: A beautiful, 22 acre, hilly estate with stunning views over the lush rice paddy fields and surrounding tropical jungle. There is an old rustic house on the site which has distant views of Koggala lake. The estate has a mixed crop of Cinnamon, Rubber, Coconut and Spices. There is easy road access, and its just a 10 minute drive to the beautiful beaches of Habaraduwa and a few minutes to the new Colombo – Matara Southern Expressway. This hilly estate is ideal for a hotel or villa development.
